page.title: 08RECREATION
page.content: The places of leisure and recreation in Tranent are the{LOCH CENTRE,}the {YOUTH CLUB,}the {BOWLING CLUB}and the {RUGBY CLUB}.The bowling club has a 120 members 85 men and 35 women.The green itself was opened to the public in 1953.Before they had there own green they used the polson park.The rugby club was opened in 1979,but the team was founded in 1971.There are 200 members in the club.There highest win is 74-0 and loss is 54-0.Tom Smith a SCOTLAND International once played for the Ross High.The Youth Club caters for about 100 children each week.The age group is 12-21yrs.There are six people who help to run the Youth Club. They don't think the new Loch Centre will afect membership.Tranent Juniors was founded in 1912 and were called Tranent United.They won the Scottish Junior Cup in 1934/5.
